title: In-person or Trusted External Party Authenticator Issuance

parameters.label: organization-defined types of and/or specific authenticators

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Require that the issuance of {{ ia-5.16_prm_1 }} be conducted {{ ia-5.16_prm_2 }} before {{ ia-5.16_prm_3 }} with authorization by {{ ia-5.16_prm_4 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Issuing authenticators in person or by a trusted external party enhances and reinforces the trustworthiness of the identity proofing process.
